title: Gorgeous 4BD 2-1/2BA Menlo Park SFR
posting_body: Gorgeous Menlo Park Home: Four Beds, Two and One-Half Baths SFR in the heart of this desirable Silicon Valley Stanford University neighborhood.
Warm wood flooring travels throughout the entire interior of the living space connecting each room.
This is an incredibly comfortable, entertaining environment where you will want to bring your friends and family every day.
This comfortable home is the best of California living, pairing expansive interior spaces with an exterior environment while providing a level of comfort and privacy you will never want to leave.
Light and bright rooms flank the formal entry.
Remodeled gourmet kitchen with center island, newer appliances and stone countertops.
Family room opens to rear yard developing the perfect setting for festive indoor/outdoor entertaining and brand new putting green.
Expansive master suite with walk-in closets.
Fine finishes include hardwood flooring, broad paned glass windows, and attractive fixtures.
Back yard oasis with putting green, mature landscaping, and attached 2-car garage.
Easy access to vibrant downtown Menlo Park, Palo Alto, commuter routes, and Silicon Valley.
You'll Want to Entertain Every Night
The well-appointed Kitchen features a spacious area for entertaining and food preparation.
Newer appliances make preparing and cooking meals a pleasure.
Ample windows, beautiful cabinetry, and modern light fixtures round out the amazing kitchen.
Summary of Key Features
Spacious Four Bedrooms Two and One-Half Bathrooms, Attached 2 Car Garage
1,500 square feet of living space on a beautiful landscaped lot
Gourmet kitchen and easy flowing indoor and outdoor spaces designed for entertaining
Gorgeous resort style back yard
Easy access to Highway 280, and Silicon Valley
Available Immediately
Good Credit A Must
No Smoking Anywhere on Property
$8,000/Month
$8,000 Security Deposit
Excellent Menlo Park School District
Tenant to Check Availability for Enrollment   <URL>
24/7 Full Service Property Management
